title: Cathy Mulligan | Digital Transformation | Chartwell Speakers

quotes: With more than 25 years of experience spanning academia, industry, and policy, she is recognised internationally for her ability to make complex technologies, from blockchain and AI to digital twins and Web3, both accessible and actionable for business leaders, governments, and society.
Her tenth book will be published in 2026.

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: She has advised the United Nations, various governments, the European Commission, high level start-ups and and multinational corporations on harnessing digital technologies for systemic change, from climate action to financial innovation.
